addition.22: * An interface for representing an origin node's adjacent nodes and incident edges in a graph.
addition.43: * Remove all references to {@code node} in the sets of adjacent nodes.
addition.48: * Remove all references to {@code edge} in the sets of incident edges.
addition.53: * Add {@code node} as a predecessor to the origin node, connected with {@code edge}.
addition.54: * In the case of an undirected graph, it also becomes a successor.
addition.59: * Add {@code node} as a successor to the origin node, connected with {@code edge}.
addition.60: * In the case of an undirected graph, it also becomes a predecessor.
